jobDescription: Position: NLP Chatbot Data Scientist  Location: Fremont, CA  Term: Full time or Contract-to-Hire Responsibilities: Contribute to the building of an enterprise Chatbot virtual assistant platform that provides conversational experience to end users  Technical Skills:  - Industrial experience building NLP pipelines for chatbots or virtual assistants  - Experience in solving AI-powered chatbot problems in a limited training data environment  - Familiarity with building and operationalizing machine learning models in a large scale production environment  - Prepare high-level design based on functional and technical specifications and map business requirement to functional specification- provided by Dice  NLP, Chatbot, Data Scientist
